translations: n.（Emery）人名；（英）埃默里；（西、意、葡）埃梅里

sentences.sentence: Emery was released on his own recognizance and will make a court appearance next week.
sentences.translation: 埃默里在签署保证书后被释放，他将在下周再度回到法庭。

sentences.sentence: It seemed to be made of grey metal, shiny but rough, like emery paper.
sentences.translation: 它看起来像是由灰白色金属制成，有光泽但很粗糙，质感如砂纸。

sentences.sentence: We wanted to put the two results together, " Emery added in a statement.
sentences.translation: 我们想把两者的结果结合起来。” 埃莫里补充说。
